title: Striker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose to wrangle a player at night.
- Choose to shoot a player with your carmine-crafted blessing-tipped rifle at night (3 use, only usable on Full Moons).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Wrangling a player will roleblock them through immunity and deal an Astral Basic attack to them. It will appear as if your target visited you.
- Shooting a player with your carmine-crafted blessing-tipped rifle will deal an Unstoppable Astral attack to them. If there's a blood moon out, your attack will be Rampaging. However, if you are visited while using your rifle, you will instead deal a Powerful attack to all players visiting you. You may shoot three players, and you may only shoot during a full moon.
- Any investigative abilities will show you as innocent and incapable of killing.
- You are sensible enough to not kill yourself if you somehow end up targeting yourself.
- You may win with **Loona** if you both spawn.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who may oppose you.

desc:
Post 666
*You little thangs ain't worth the cleanup.*
